text: Pelikán má alibi is a 1940 Czechoslovak criminal comedy film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Miroslav Homola, Marie Glázrová, Jaroslav Marvan. ==References== ==External links== *Pelikán má alibi at the Internet Movie Database Category:1940 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:1940s crime comedy films Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak crime comedy films Category:Czechoslovak black- and-white films Category:Czech crime comedy films Category:1940 comedy films
title: Pelikán má alibi
